short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Removes annoying Antenna font where it isn't needed on atFord.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Antenna font on ford.com can be annoying, especially on at.ford, which is dense with content. This add-on attempts to make it easier on the eyes by replacing the proprietary font in non-heading content with a more standard sans serif font.
